page.title: 12WOOD FARM,WARBOYS - TODAY
page.content: Kind of farm.... Arable. Type of crops....Wheat,Barley,and Rape. Type of soil....Heavy clay named Wicken clay. How many Acres....400acres ,250 in Warboys and 150 at Pidley. Machinery....tractors,combine, fertiliser-spreader,seed drill and a power-plough. The farm has a four year rotation... first wheat , then barley, and then any crop, and then oil-seed rape. Oil-seed rape has been planted at Wood Farm for 13 years.Mr Woodward has 110 acres of oil-seed rape.The oil-seed rape is used for vegetable oils. Wheat is used for flour for bread and other items of food. Barley is used for animal feeds. The farm is run by Mr Woodward and a full-time worker.
